ygData.subject: RE: Enchanters vs Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... [As is my bard for that matter] ... I have read complaints about this spell from higher level enchanters. It is a LOT of mana, yes. And it does not last
ygData.messageBody:
>> I do not know how many of the buffs overwrite higher level
>>enchanter buffs as my enchanter is still lower level.
[As is my bard for that matter]

> Think of the mana cost of Swift Like the Wind (L49 Enchanter) x 3
> [assuming 3 tanks]... god that's over 2 bubbles of mana if I remember
> correctly, hehe.


I have read complaints about this spell from higher level enchanters. It is
a LOT of mana, yes. And it does not last very long. There is a good post on
this matter over on the Solusek Ro board by Icelle Mindfury.

http://www.solusekro.org/cgi-bin/wwwthreads/showpost.pl?Cat=&Board=NAG&Numbe
r=2175
